document_data.name: Brunos Costak
document_data.mainbody: '''Brunos Costak''' was one of the Western Divisional Leaders of the [[Iron Throne]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: He worked alongside his colleague [[Rieltar Anchev]], the architect behind the [[Iron crisis]] that plagued the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Brunos accompanied Rieltar to [[Candlekeep]]. They sought to negotiate a treaty with the [[Knights of the Shield]] after the villain [[Sarevok]] took control of the Baldurian [[Iron Throne]] to his own end.

It was rumored Brunos was killed along with the other members of that meeting, though every other one of them lived for years afterwards.
